reminder whenever you want the reminder to come...-=-

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] International Freedom in Education Day
messages.msgSnippet: sandra you can put it on the group calendar and set it to send a reminder whenever you want the reminder to come... From: Sandra Dodd Sent: Tuesday, September
messages.messageBody:
sandra you can put it on the group calendar and set it to send a reminder whenever you want the reminder to come...


From: Sandra Dodd
Sent: Tuesday, September 14, 2010 8:20 PM
To: AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [AlwaysLearning] International Freedom in Education Day



http://sandradodd.blogspot.com/2010/09/international-freedom-in-education-day.html

I'm way on the late end of the international collection of time zones,
so this is already in full swing in most of the world.

Could some of you who are the very organized type bring this up next
fall in time for people to organize parties or something, please?
If I put it on a calendar, I'll lose the calendar. I even lose online
calendars; seriously. I'm the one who put it up on facebook, many
months ago, and then Holly told me a while ago that it was there.

http://jipli.free.fr/

Sandra






[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
